message: This is a more unstructured list of companies using Django: http://code.djangoproject.com/wiki/CaseStudyLeads

Wonder if I should make a list like that for my country. Waiting for a quote to get approved but they are a little affraid they get stuck with me because they don't know if there are other companies doing Django around here.
This article just came out: Boston companies using Django. http://bit.ly/fBQqgA
@dartdog yes, Eldarion seems a strange omission given we're arguably the biggest *contributors* in the area; but hey, we didn't submit ourselves to the list, so our fault :-)
We're definitely using django at SimpleGeo
@jtauber while it's too late to get listed in the article, it's not too late to add your name to the list of companies in Boston using Django. http://bit.ly/hPPOZO
@jtauber it would be great to see you at a future Boston Django meetup. It's been a long time since you last presented Pinax a few years ago!
@casey Last I checked you guys were just a tad outside of Boston ;-)
@natea Ah, yes...I guess I was replying to the posting of that second link.
